liability_cap: No explicit monetary limitation of liability cap stated; indemnification obligations apply.
risk_explanation: The agreement contains broad mutual indemnification, including IP infringement and product design/manufacture-related claims, without any stated cap on liability. It also provides for injunctive relief and waives bond requirements, increasing exposure. There is no clear termination-for-convenience right, and the initial term is long (10 years) with potential renewals.
